resources.string: Loading...Please wait as we process your request
Unable to pick file. Check status of file manager.

Please check the vector outputs and if you notice areas where the displacement of vectors is unexpectedly bigger than the surrounding vectors, kindly move BACK a little and perform the experiment again. You can also change the window size and overlap and repeat the experiment
Please be advised that you can get a better vector output and display if you move FORWARD and perform the experiment again. You can also change the window size and overlap and repeat the experiment
